## AlRoute.setCallback() method

Updates the route to use a specific callback action.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCallback(callback?: {
        (route: AlRoute, mouseEvent?: any): void;
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | <code>{</code><br/><code>        (route: AlRoute, mouseEvent?: any): void;</code><br/><code>    }</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
